# pop

Displays Top 15 Tickers in the last hour or today. /pop 1hr or /pop 1d

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/pop interval
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| interval | Interval to filter by. `1hr`: "1 Hour", `1d`: "1 Day", | False | 1hr, 1d |


---

## Examples

```
/pop 1hr
```

---
